phrases: What are you so angry about?
I am sorry for getting in the way of your experiment,
but humans are a dime a dozen as far as you are concerned.
I thought they were worthless to you.
You can just take a quick look around and snatch one right up.
Isabelle, did they tease you again?
This is the appearance that God gave me.
It is not like I can help that my hair is carrot-colored,
or that my eyes are the color of weeds.
I love you no matter what you look like.
A child got hit by a carriage!
I saw them chasing after Isabelle!
She ran into the street herself!
I have not heard her voice in a long time.
She is going to be lonely if she wakes up alone.
I woke up, did not I?
Her materials cost quite a bit, you know.
Corpses are not free, nor is managing the containers.
Do not you dare call me by that name.
You are just a monster that found a human body.
A freak calling another a freak, huh?
I have put a spell on the bullet to stop regeneration.
Well, I am in a lot of pain.
I am a little surprised, too.
Chise, am I not terrifying in this form?
I am going to turn back, so let go.
I do not think you could get through the door being that tall.
Silky would be furious with me if I broke the door.
I would apologize with you even if she was.
Do not go darting off like that!
I thought about abandoning you when I saw your letter.
Do not overestimate your own strength.
You are my apprentice and my bodyguard.
A bodyguard ought not to leave their master's side.
It takes a lot of work to fix.
I just want that dog because he would make a good subject.
Sorcerers do not step into mage territory.
Why do you go after the fairies?
I could make something interesting if I used a fairy for a chimera.
But fairy curses are a pain to deal with.
That is why I put a collar on that sorcerer.
I do not need a dog if it cannot even run my errands.
You deceived Matthew in Ulthar and killed Mina.
I think I could get some decent results if I tried it again.
I absolutely will not let you have him!
Truth be told, you can do anything with magic.
You can turn rocks into gold,
make fish swim through the sky, keep harvests from ever rotting.
His words fly through my mind.
But... that is something that must not be done.
I will not let you have him.
You are pretty knowledgeable for a kid.
they are just going to get eaten.
She just ate a little of me.
Chise, you must not do that.
We must not twist the rules of this world!
Why did I want that, again?
Why did I want to make a chimera in the first place?
Now, go find him with your strings.
That wretch will not come looking for us here.
Damn it, you have brought so much trouble with you.
Buy you do not hate it, do you?
A blue flame fairy that lives in forests and cemeteries, confusing passers-by.
My blood's racing through my body.
I did not listen to you.
It feels like my blood's going to overflow and explode.
You are a Sleigh Beggy, huh?
You will feel a little better.
You are finally awake, you sleepy dog.
Do not be crazy, you dumb dog.
You are neither human, nor an ordinary dog.
and stop depending on dead people!
Quit whining and go back to your useful form, church grim!
Your job is to chase the grave robbers' asses to the gates of Hell.
No matter how long I wait, my sister will not come back.
Chise, will you take me with you?
I will give you my all.
Sleigh Beggy or not, we cannot be the ones to ask a human to make a pact!
He is requesting to become your familiar.
The ultimate promise, that you would share everything with one another.
Your senses, your emotions, even your time.
I have seen inside you, so I know.
Do not you need to wait for Isabelle?
I told you not to call me that!
I would gotten used to that arm.
I will not give your arm back.
I do not want an arm that is been used as an ingredient for a freak.
Hey, he is taken on a dog's form.
That makes him an easier target.
I do not want him to take me.
I do not want to be here.
I do not want to be alone anymore, either.
Tie now the roots of our veins.
The holly, so that we may not be separated.
The ivy, so that we may not come apart.
Tie to the yew tree seven times.
Until the day the snake spits out its tail.
Chise, give me a new name.
He woke up from his dream of being human.
Wait for me until my time with her is over.
So you belong to her now, huh?
Undoing a pact is such a pain.
Why do not you back off, then?
You learn to give up quickly when you live for a long time.
What is the purpose that drives you?
I am sick of rotting away until an end that I do not even know will come.
But why is my body like this?
You do not mind making others suffer for your sake?
Is not that how living things are?
If that is what you think, you are neither human nor beast.
You are nothing but a monster in human form, Cartaphilus.
My name is Joseph, little boy.
He is like a natural disaster.
It is said that the Son of God cursed him so that he can never die.
He is a monster that roams aimlessly, driven only to satiate his curiosity.
And what happened was the result of being chosen by that monster.
My head may have flown if I would refused.
Be careful on your way home.
I do not need you to worry for me.
I have to send them off.
You sure are a hard worker.
My job is to send the living to the swamp.
But my job is also to see the dead off to the gates to the other side.
This one is artificial, but being so, it will bear an artificial soul.
Well, we would better head home, too.
I can explain things to you tomorrow.
Your scolding will come when we get home, too.
Let us go home together, Ruth.
From now on, where you go home is where I go home.
The girl steps into a beautiful rose garden, her mind still burdened by her troubles.
Speak of me, and I will eat you.
